values: To slam is to close something hard.
She slammed the book shut after she finished reading it.
vt. & vi. 砰地关上(门或窗)
vt. 猛烈抨击
n. 猛然关闭的声音SLAMabbr. Strategic Low Altitude Missile 低空战略导弹
